title: C-BAM aims to reward India's investment in green energy: French Envoy to OECD
description: The EU's Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism (C-BAM) aims to recognize India's green energy investments, as clarified by France's OECD representative, Amelie de Montchalin. Emphasizing collaborative green transition, India and France advocate for national decision-making and inclusive global financial governance while planning eco-friendly economic development.
